code: import axios from'axios';var sendReq=function sendReq(configReq){return new Promise(function(resolve,reject){var config={method:configReq.method,url:"https://document-share-server.herokuapp.com".concat(configReq.url),headers:configReq.header,withCredentials:true,data:configReq.data};axios(config).then(function(res){return resolve(res);}).catch(function(err){return reject(err);});});};export default sendReq;
